faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Answers to common inquiries about membership and services

join.question: How can I join the association?
join.answer: You can join the association by filling out the membership form on the 'Membership' page and submitting the required documents along with the registration and subscription fees.

fees.question: What are the membership fees?
fees.answer: Membership fees consist of a one-time registration fee of XXX Riyals, in addition to an annual subscription of XXX Riyals. When joining for the first time, you pay the registration fee plus a two-year subscription.

renewal.question: How can I renew my membership?
renewal.answer: You can renew your membership by logging into your account on the website and going to the 'Renew Membership' page or by visiting the association's headquarters.

documents.question: What documents are required for membership?
documents.answer: Required documents include: a personal photo, a copy of ID, a certified copy of academic qualification, a copy of professional license if available, and a copy of the approved signature and stamp.

events.question: Can I attend association events without being a member?
events.answer: Yes, some events are open to the public, while some training courses and events are exclusive to members or offered at discounted rates for them.
